Description: Ostracon, fragment of the base of the neck of a red-brown pottery jar, the fabric is partially grey-black in section, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of one line of red-painted Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394162) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394162)
